Make the newly renovated Country Place Apartments your home And see for yourself where you can live in luxury at affordable rents  Everyone is very friendly in this spacious quiet community. No noise so you can relax and be with your family in comfort.  Move in today to our clean and beautiful, extra large 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. Enjoy peaceful easy living in a very desirable location.  One bedroom apartments - 750 sq ft starting at $525. Two bedroom apartments - 1,034 sq ft starting at $625. Two bedroom apartments come with 1 and 1/2 baths. Three bedroom apartments - 1,236 sq ft starting at $700. The three bedroom apartments come with two FULL baths. Each unit has a large walk-in closet, private balcony or patio. Select units with fireplaces, pool or tennis court views or adjacent to wooded area. Pet Friendly (Some restrictions apply).  Amenities Energy efficient for low utility bills Large Pool with Cabana 2 lighted Tennis Courts Large Barbecue Grills and Gazebo Spacious Grounds Security cameras Best school Districts. Experienced onsite maintenance staff for emergency calls.  Monthly routine maintenance and pest control.  Wal-Mart and plenty of convenience stores within a mile. Close to shopping and the Albany Mall with all the good restaurants nearby  Application fee is $50 (money order only) per each adult and you we will let you know within hours Simply bring in your application fee, proof of household income (must be at least 3 times the rent), your driver's license, and complete your application in our office.  If you are pressed for time, print and bring in your application.  Visit us on FaceBook https://www.facebook.com/Country-Place-Apartments-569224190090361/

Greystone at Oakland is the newest gated community in Lee County/Albany area.  We offer well-designed one, two- and three-bedroom luxury apartment homes.  All apartment homes feature gourmet kitchens with quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, crown molding, and intrusion alarms. Our community includes an elegant clubhouse, business center, On-site 24-hour emergency maintenance, professional on-site management, 24-hour activity center and resort style pool with grilling area at the pool cabana.

Come see our newly renovated apartment homes at Treeside Park! Nestled in a peaceful, wooded environment with all major conveniences at its doorstep, Treeside Park offers beautifully renovated apartment homes with large and spacious floor plans, abundant parking, and attentive on site management. Strategically located just minutes from shopping, major Interstate Highways, Albany Airport, and in close proximity to Darton State College, Albany Tech, Albany Mall, and the Marine Corp Logistics Base. Your future home awaits at the new Treeside Park!  Office hours are Monday through Friday 8:30 am to 5:30 pm, Saturday & Sunday by appointment only. Please call  show contact info  or visit us today at 2315 W Gordon Ave, Albany, GA 31707. We look forward to seeing you! Greystone at Oakland has perfected the experience of apartment living by adding the best amenities and features we could to our community.  Whether they function to make your life easier or just more fun, our slate of amenities is unrivaled in the Albany/Leesburg area.  Our residents enjoy their gourmet kitchen with quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, private deck or sunroom, tubs and walk in showers, cardio theatre fitness center, slat water pool with wading pool, pool cabana and grilling area, tanning center, professional staff, concierge services and so much more.  Call today for availability.

PLEASE READ THE AD THOROUGHLY TO VIEW THE HOME This house is FOR SALE with owner financing! I am looking to sell to someone with a good job history and a strong down payment. The house is 3 bedrooms, with 2 bathrooms beautiful historic homebuilt in the early 1900s and has been fully remodeled. Hardwood floors throughout, 12 ft ceilings, original fireplace mantles, intricate trim work and built-ins. Well updated with gas fireplace, tankless water heater, new kitchen appliances, and a 5 year old metal roof to name a few updates.  Best Part is we are owner financing which means no bank qualifying. I usually get 10-20% down on owner financed houses, so reach out to me if this is something you may be interested in. The total sales price is $159,900, and the monthly payment will be at or around $1,370 (piti) depending on your down payment. I will not bother with a credit check. I will use your income as qualification (must have the down payment and 3x the monthly payment in verifiable income). F & Qs 1. Do I own the home? Do I have a closing? We close with a local title company or closing attorney. You own the home. We take back the note just like a bank. 2. What is the rate and down payment? Down payment and rate depend on income, but it is not unusual to get $15k -$20k down. Sometimes we get more. We usually do your payment on a 20- or 30-year term, no balloons or prepayment penalties. 3. What if I make changes to the home? ItÃ¢Â€Â™s your home, make it your home. All we are worried about are the payments being make on time. Feel free to make changes to YOUR home. 4. I am interested in the home and have a reasonable down payment, how do I see the home?  Email us with your down payment and when you are wanting to move. We will set up a reasonable time to see the home.

Welcome home to Greystone at Oakland!  Your home at Greystone at Oakland offers all the comforts of the good life, the pleasures of a private home, the luxury of a fine resort, the convenience of being near everything in the Leesburg and Albany, GA area.  We offer a variety of new, well-designed one, two- and three-bedroom luxury apartments in Leesburg.  Our apartment homes feature gourmet kitchens with quartz countertops and stainless-steel appliances, 9 ft. ceiling with crown molding, garden tubs and walk-in closets in every bedroom.  Additionally, our residents enjoy our resort style pool, grilling area at the pool cabana, 24-hour activity center and so much more.  Call today for availability.

Make the newly renovated Country Place Apartments your home And see for yourself where you can live in luxury at affordable rents  Everyone is very friendly in this spacious quiet community. No noise so you can relax and be with your family in comfort.  Move in today to our clean and beautiful, extra large 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. Enjoy peaceful easy living in a very desirable location.  One bedroom apartments - 750 sq ft starting at $525. Two bedroom apartments - 1,034 sq ft starting at $625. Two bedroom apartments come with 1 and 1/2 baths. Three bedroom apartments - 1,236 sq ft starting at $700. The three bedroom apartments come with two FULL baths. Each unit has a large walk-in closet, private balcony or patio. Select units with fireplaces, pool or tennis court views or adjacent to wooded area. Pet Friendly (Some restrictions apply).  Amenities Energy efficient for low utility bills Large Pool with Cabana 2 lighted Tennis Courts Large Barbecue Grills and Gazebo Spacious Grounds Security cameras Best school Districts. Experienced onsite maintenance staff for emergency calls.  Monthly routine maintenance and pest control.  Wal-Mart and plenty of convenience stores within a mile. Close to shopping and the Albany Mall with all the good restaurants nearby  Application fee is $50 (money order only) per each adult and you we will let you know within hours Simply bring in your application fee, proof of household income (must be at least 3 times the rent), your driver's license, and complete your application in our office.  If you are pressed for time, print and bring in your application.  Visit us on FaceBook https://www.facebook.com/Country-Place-Apartments-569224190090361/

Make the newly renovated Country Place Apartments your home And see for yourself where you can live in luxury at affordable rents  Everyone is very friendly in this spacious quiet community. No noise so you can relax and be with your family in comfort.  Move in today to our clean and beautiful, extra large 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. Enjoy peaceful easy living in a very desirable location.  One bedroom apartments - 750 sq ft starting at $525. Two bedroom apartments - 1,034 sq ft starting at $625. Two bedroom apartments come with 1 and 1/2 baths. Three bedroom apartments - 1,236 sq ft starting at $700. The three bedroom apartments come with two FULL baths. Each unit has a large walk-in closet, private balcony or patio. Select units with fireplaces, pool or tennis court views or adjacent to wooded area. Pet Friendly (Some restrictions apply).  Amenities Energy efficient for low utility bills Large Pool with Cabana 2 lighted Tennis Courts Large Barbecue Grills and Gazebo Spacious Grounds Security cameras Best school Districts. Experienced onsite maintenance staff for emergency calls.  Monthly routine maintenance and pest control.  Wal-Mart and plenty of convenience stores within a mile. Close to shopping and the Albany Mall with all the good restaurants nearby  Application fee is $50 (money order only) per each adult and you we will let you know within hours Simply bring in your application fee, proof of household income (must be at least 3 times the rent), your driver's license, and complete your application in our office.  If you are pressed for time, print and bring in your application.  Visit us on FaceBook https://www.facebook.com/Country-Place-Apartments-569224190090361/

Make the newly renovated Country Place Apartments your home And see for yourself where you can live in luxury at affordable rents  Everyone is very friendly in this spacious quiet community. No noise so you can relax and be with your family in comfort.  Move in today to our clean and beautiful, extra large 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. Enjoy peaceful easy living in a very desirable location.  One bedroom apartments - 750 sq ft starting at $525. Two bedroom apartments - 1,034 sq ft starting at $625. Two bedroom apartments come with 1 and 1/2 baths. Three bedroom apartments - 1,236 sq ft starting at $700. The three bedroom apartments come with two FULL baths. Each unit has a large walk-in closet, private balcony or patio. Select units with fireplaces, pool or tennis court views or adjacent to wooded area. Pet Friendly (Some restrictions apply).  Amenities Energy efficient for low utility bills Large Pool with Cabana 2 lighted Tennis Courts Large Barbecue Grills and Gazebo Spacious Grounds Security cameras Best school Districts. Experienced onsite maintenance staff for emergency calls.  Monthly routine maintenance and pest control.  Wal-Mart and plenty of convenience stores within a mile. Close to shopping and the Albany Mall with all the good restaurants nearby  Application fee is $50 (money order only) per each adult and you we will let you know within hours Simply bring in your application fee, proof of household income (must be at least 3 times the rent), your driver's license, and complete your application in our office.  If you are pressed for time, print and bring in your application.  Visit us on FaceBook https://www.facebook.com/Country-Place-Apartments-569224190090361/

READ AD COMPLETELY not rent to own This house is FOR SALE with owner financing! I am looking to sell to someone with a good job history and a strong down payment. The house is 4 bedrooms, with 3 bathrooms and an inground pool. The kitchen has had some updating while other parts of the house will need some cosmetic work. You can do improvements while you live there! I usually get 10-20% down on owner financed houses, so reach out to me if this is something you may be interested in. The total sales price is $129,000, and the monthly payment will be at or around $950 depending on your down payment. I will not bother with a credit check. I will use your income as qualification (must have the down payment and 3x the monthly payment in verifiable income). F & Qs 1. Do I own the home? Do I have a closing? We close with a local title company or closing attorney. You own the home. We take back the note just like a bank. 2. What is the rate and down payment? Down payment and rate depend on income, but it is not unusual to get $15k -$20k down. Sometimes we get more. We usually do your payment on a 20- or 30-year term, no balloons or prepayment penalties. 3. What if I make changes to the home? ItÃ¢Â€Â™s your home, make it your home. All we are worried about are the payments being make on time. Feel free to make changes to YOUR home. 4. I am interested in the home and have a reasonable down payment, how do I see the home?  Email us with your down payment and when you are wanting to move. We will set up a reasonable time to see the home.

Make the newly renovated Country Place Apartments your home And see for yourself where you can live in luxury at affordable rents  Everyone is very friendly in this spacious quiet community. No noise so you can relax and be with your family in comfort.  Move in today to our clean and beautiful, extra large 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. Enjoy peaceful easy living in a very desirable location.  One bedroom apartments - 750 sq ft starting at $525. Two bedroom apartments - 1,034 sq ft starting at $625. Two bedroom apartments come with 1 and 1/2 baths. Three bedroom apartments - 1,236 sq ft starting at $700. The three bedroom apartments come with two FULL baths. Each unit has a large walk-in closet, private balcony or patio. Select units with fireplaces, pool or tennis court views or adjacent to wooded area. Pet Friendly (Some restrictions apply).  Amenities Energy efficient for low utility bills Large Pool with Cabana 2 lighted Tennis Courts Large Barbecue Grills and Gazebo Spacious Grounds Security cameras Best school Districts. Experienced onsite maintenance staff for emergency calls.  Monthly routine maintenance and pest control.  Wal-Mart and plenty of convenience stores within a mile. Close to shopping and the Albany Mall with all the good restaurants nearby  Application fee is $50 (money order only) per each adult and you we will let you know within hours Simply bring in your application fee, proof of household income (must be at least 3 times the rent), your driver's license, and complete your application in our office.  If you are pressed for time, print and bring in your application.  Visit us on FaceBook https://www.facebook.com/Country-Place-Apartments-569224190090361/

Welcome home to Greystone at Oakland!  Your home at Greystone at Oakland offers all the comforts of the good life, the pleasures of a private home, the luxury of a fine resort, the convenience of being near everything in the Leesburg and Albany, GA area.  We offer a variety of new, well-designed one, two- and three-bedroom luxury apartments in Leesburg.  Our apartment homes feature gourmet kitchens with quartz countertops and stainless-steel appliances, 9 ft. ceiling with crown molding, garden tubs and walk-in closets in every bedroom.  Additionally, our residents enjoy our resort style pool, grilling area at the pool cabana, 24-hour activity center and so much more.  Call today for availability.

Make the newly renovated Country Place Apartments your home And see for yourself where you can live in luxury at affordable rents  Everyone is very friendly in this spacious quiet community. No noise so you can relax and be with your family in comfort.  Move in today to our clean and beautiful, extra large 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. Enjoy peaceful easy living in a very desirable location.  One bedroom apartments - 750 sq ft starting at $525. Two bedroom apartments - 1,034 sq ft starting at $625. Two bedroom apartments come with 1 and 1/2 baths. Three bedroom apartments - 1,236 sq ft starting at $700. The three bedroom apartments come with two FULL baths. Each unit has a large walk-in closet, private balcony or patio. Select units with fireplaces, pool or tennis court views or adjacent to wooded area. Pet Friendly (Some restrictions apply).  Amenities Energy efficient for low utility bills Large Pool with Cabana 2 lighted Tennis Courts Large Barbecue Grills and Gazebo Spacious Grounds Security cameras Best school Districts. Experienced onsite maintenance staff for emergency calls.  Monthly routine maintenance and pest control.  Wal-Mart and plenty of convenience stores within a mile. Close to shopping and the Albany Mall with all the good restaurants nearby  Application fee is $50 (money order only) per each adult and you we will let you know within hours Simply bring in your application fee, proof of household income (must be at least 3 times the rent), your driver's license, and complete your application in our office.  If you are pressed for time, print and bring in your application.  Visit us on FaceBook https://www.facebook.com/Country-Place-Apartments-569224190090361/

J&J Investment Properties LLC specializes in providing affordable and modern off-campus housing to the students at UAlbany and the College of Saint Rose. We own 27 apartments that house over 100 students. Our properties, which can accommodate 3/4/5/6/7/8 students, are located on Hamilton Street, Hudson Avenue, Quail Street, Ontario Street, Morris Street and State Street. Most of our apartments have been renovated and include stainless steel appliances, washer/dryer (free of charge) updated kitchens/bathrooms and 50Ã¢Â€Â HD Smart TVÃ¢Â€Â™s mounted to the wall in the living room. Additionally, we have over 30 off-street parking spots available in the area.   Rent per bedroom ranges from $500-650 (utilities are not included in this price). We DO NOT outsource our property management. Instead, we choose to manage our properties in a very Ã¢Â€Â˜hands on mannerÃ¢Â€Â™, with a full-time employee who performs property maintenance each week, ensuring all of your issues are handled promptly and professionally. Our goal is to ensure our residents remain happy throughout their lease and enjoy the comfort of their apartment!    All properties are very safe and secure with steel door entrance ways and the option of installing a security system with live policy monitoring for a very low monthly rate. If you are a student and looking to move off-campus to save money (our rates are 50% of what is charged on campus), we are the Company to contact! We have a stellar reputation in the area and are able to walk you (and your parents) through the process of living off-campus and becoming a resident in one of our buildings.   Showings are generally on Saturday/Sunday between 11AM and 5PM. However, we are able to setup additional times to accommodate your group if necessary. To schedule a showing, please contact Justin at  show contact info  or visit our website at www.jandjip.com to learn more information about us and see pictures of our properties.

Set in a distinctive completely renovated 19th century historic building in the charming Stockade District this spacious and renovated one bedroom apartment offers stainless steel appliances, new hardwood floors, a California Closets System, and a renovated bath.    The brand new stainless steel appliances give it a modern and sleek look.  Also the kitchen is built around the cook so no more running back and forth to prepare a meal.    Furthermore, the apartment offers a dishwasher for further ease.  The living room has more than enough space to accommodate a large dining room table and full living room set, even a large sectional couch.    The bedroom is oversized and boasts a California Closet system allowing the tenant more efficient and hence greater storage.  Each unit has its own reserved parking space.  So you will never return home from a long day's work and face the frustration of searching for parking.    The Stockade District neighborhood is defined by its charm and 1850s homes.  These desirable and well maintained classic homes provide the inhabitants pleasant surroundings in this upscale neighborhood.   Downtown Schenectady, Little Italy, Proctors Theater, the Rivers Resort Casino, and (although we will not accept undergraduate students at this property) Union College and Schenectady County Community College are all only minutes away.  This gives our tenants easy access to all of the restaurants, bars, and entertainment the city has to offer.  The property is a 5 minute drive to I-890, and a 5 minute walk to the brand new Amtrak Station, which offers service to NYC and points north such as Rutland, VT and even Toronto and Montreal.  This proximity and easy access to travel routes makes it effortless for commuters.  There is a well-equipped laundry on the premises making it most convenient for our tenants.  The apartment comes with its own tenant controlled heating and central air conditioning system, and private entrance.  Pet-friendly but restrictions do apply.  Owner provides water, trash collection, snow removal, and all maintenance.  The tenants only pay for electricity.  Thank you for considering our apartments, Andover Property Partners

2 local landlords who have been student friendly landlords for over 20 years have many apartments available for June 1. All of them are either on Myrtle Ave, Park Ave, or Washington Ave, and all of them are very close to the College of Saint Rose.   We have 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 & 7-bedroom apartments available starting June 1st near the College of St. Rose. The rents are in the $400s per tenant for a 2-BR or larger apartment, and in the $800s for a 1-bedroom apartment. Utilities are not included. All of our apartments are within walking distance to the College of St. Rose. Most have laundry service in the building at no additional charge. We are student friendly landlords from the neighborhood who has been renting quality apartments for over 2 decades.   One of us is a UAlbany alumni who is sensitive to students' needs by being in your very same shoes in the very same neighborhood that you want to live in.  Here is what sets us apart from most landlords in this city. We are hands on landlords who have mastered the skilled trades. If you meet with any other landlord you will notice that they are typically well dressed with a nice non-work vehicle who often refers to "employees" or "my guy" will take care of that. Well, we both have Ford F150 work trucks, and have Carhartt clothes as our 3-piece suit. Here are some of the credentials of at lease one if not both landlords:  -City of Albany Licensed Master Electrician -Plumber -Heating Contractor -Framer -General Contractor  One of us is a combat veteran with the US Armed Forces.  You would be hard pressed to find more competent, caring landlords who actually maintains our buildings, as well as treating you fairly, with respect, gives you your privacy, and tells you the truth. You will have no problems with things breaking in your apartment that don't get fixed in a timely manner.  The pictures on this ad reflect many apartments that we have.  Details:  Available June 1.  1-year lease.  I will be checking your references.  No dogs. No utilities are included.  Contact me, Mark, with your student-friendly housing needs. Chances are we have a perfect apartment for you.  -Mark  UAlbanyoffcampus.com StRoseOffCampus.com

The home comes with all furnishings, LCD TV's, as well as linens, kitchenware/dishes/utensils/pots & pans, cable, phone, WIFI, and even WII...just pack your bags and move-in! This spectacular home was recently updated and won an award from the Preservation Foundation. The home was designed to offer two separate living quarters, each with full-sized separate kitchens, bathrooms and entrances, or combine the two for a large space to be enjoyed by all...simply gorgeous!   This historic home is located within walking distance of all the best that Saratoga Springs has to offer, including hot spots for dining, shopping, art and culture, as well as entertainment.   Enjoy horse racing, music concerts, and wine tasting, or try your luck at Saratoga Casino and Raceway. Saratoga Lake and Skidmore College are also easily accessible from this beautiful home. Easy access to it all...Saratoga Race Course, Saratoga Performing Arts Center, Saratoga Spa State Park, Saratoga National Historical Park, Saratoga Golf Courses, Saratoga's Museums, Spas, Mineral Springs and much more!   Ã¢Â€Â¢ Incredible dining, appetizers, coffee shops and so much more. The following are located within a short walk: - Neighboring restaurants are Chianti Il Ristorante, Hattie's, Wheatfields, Maestro's Restaurant, Forno Bistro, Olde Bryan Inn, Ravenous, One Caroline Street Bistro - Coffee, tea, etc.: Uncommon Grounds Coffee & Tea, Starbucks, Saratoga Coffee Traders, Legends Cafe, Eugenio's Cafe Gelato, West Side Stadium CafÃƒÂ© - The Winebar Bar   Ã¢Â€Â¢ Saratoga Race Course: Also know as Saratoga Racetrack or "the flat track", Saratoga Race Course is the oldest continually operating Thoroughbred horse racing track in the United States. The track is home to the Travers Stakes, "America's Mid-Summer Derby" which occurs in late August.   Ã¢Â€Â¢ Saratoga Performing Arts Center: Referred to locals and frequent visitors as "SPAC", this outdoor performing arts venue features classical performances, the Saratoga Jazz Festival, the Saratoga Wine and Food Festival and major pop and rock concerts. It is the summer home of the New York City Ballet and The Philadelphia Orchestra.   Ã¢Â€Â¢ Saratoga Casino and Raceway: With over 1,000 video gaming machines, harness racing and a night club, Saratoga Casino and Raceway has plenty going on. Just be sure to bring your good luck charms!   Ã¢Â€Â¢ Saratoga Spa State Park: With over 2,000 pristine acres of park, Saratoga Spa State Park has to be at the top of an outdoor lover's list of things to do while visiting Saratoga. The park features mineral springs, reflecting pools, an automobile museum, a hotel, a spa, a golf course and more.   Ã¢Â€Â¢ Saratoga National Historical Park: Known as the Turning Point of the Revolutionary War, the Battle of Saratoga happened here. Learn more at a comprehensive Visitor Center or take a ride around the tour road.   Ã¢Â€Â¢ Saratoga Golf Courses: Visitors will find some of the best golf value in the Northeast in Saratoga. From Saratoga National Golf Club, one of the top 100 public courses in the country according to Golf Digest, to award-winning Airway Meadows, you're sure to find the perfect place to tee off.   Ã¢Â€Â¢ Saratoga's Museums: With over 10 museums, including three national museums, history is alive here. Check out the National Museum of Racing, the National Bottle Museum or the National Museum of Dance. You can also visit museums that feature art, automobiles, local history and more.   Ã¢Â€Â¢ Mineral Springs : With 18 naturally occurring mineral springs in Saratoga, you can "take the cure" as visitors did during the Victorian age. The first major attractions in Saratoga, these springs still flow throughout the area.   Ã¢Â€Â¢ Saratoga's Spas: Saratoga was known as the "Queen of the Spas" for many years. Today, visitors can still enjoy natural mineral baths from the bubbling springs below or more modern treatments at several local spas.   Ã¢Â€Â¢ Saratoga Polo: Enjoy action-packed polo at Saratoga Polo's Whitney Field, one of the most historic Polo fields in the United States. This exciting venue features dining and entertainment options as well. Character, history, and charm are just a few of the reasons Saratoga was named as one of America's Dozen Distinctive Destinations by the National Trust for Historic Preservation. However, this sort of acclaim is nothing new to Saratoga.   For centuries, Saratoga Springs has been a premier destination. Discover all there is to see and do here, from world-famous horse racing at Saratoga Race Course during the summer to award-winning golf. There is so much to do in Saratoga...the perfect place for your next getaway!  (dogs considered on a case-by-case basis)

Just in time after the holidays, beautiful new townhomes to make your own!  These gorgeous townhomes each feature 1,500 square feet of living space, garage parking (secure with garage doors) for two cars underneath, plus paved parking for an additional car in front, secure entry access through front door with walled, heated stairwell to first floor, access to river through double rear-doors, 8Ã¢Â€Â™ x 16Ã¢Â€Â™ concrete patio with privacy fencing, 8Ã¢Â€Â™ x 16Ã¢Â€Â™ decks on first and second floors with privacy fencing, 9Ã¢Â€Â™ slider on first floor, 6Ã¢Â€Â™ slider on second floor, 9Ã¢Â€Â™ ceilings on first floor, 2 Ã‚Â¼Ã¢Â€Â hickory hardwood flooring throughout with ceramic tile in bathrooms, half-wall for hallway and decorative column on each floor, modern kitchen with 42Ã¢Â€Â cabinets, recessed and pendant lighting, stainless-steel Frigidaire Gallery appliances (refrigerator, microwave, gas flat-top oven, dishwasher), double-bowl stainless-steel sink and Delta faucet, three full bathrooms with excellent in-room and natural lighting, three bedrooms, each with two bi-fold louvre door closets, linen closets, large living room, large window placements, Goodman high-efficiency, hot-air gas furnace, 50-gallon water heater, Goodman air-conditioner, washer-dryer closet with complete hookups (can be supplied by tenant or landlord), Village water and sewer connections, exterior lighting for front door, perimeter lighting and lighting for rear patio, and green space for lawn, flowers etc. in back of unit facing the Mohawk River.  This unique canal location offers plenty of walking (Peebles Island, restaurants, shops, museums, library and supermarkets), boating, and exercise (kayaking, hiking, biking etc.) opportunities along the Champlain and Erie Canals, state parks and bike trails and within the village.  There are also many festivals (Canal, Steam Ship, 4th of July, and Tug-Boat Round-up) and the Sunday Waterford Waterfront farmers market a short walk from this townhome on the canal.  The price range for these townhomes is $1,699 - $2,499 per month (plus heat and electric) depending on the market, number of people, rental term and configuration.  Pets may also be considered. A beautiful 1st floor partially furnished apartment with 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, separate laundry room, separate office/den on a quiet street and only 3 blocks to Broadway - close to Skidmore and the hospital too.  The apartment was completely remodeled four years ago and has new Energy Star appliances and a very efficient gas furnace as well as central air (low utility rates).  This apartment has all new energy star windows with a lot of natural light as well as a back deck and a Saratoga style front porch. The apartment also has a dining room, eat in kitchen, living room and a 12 x 12 covered pavilion and room to garden. The pictures show the office/den used as both a small 3rd bedroom and alternately as an office. There is the opportunity to store many items/boxes in a dry basement and attic and lots of green space with perennial flowers as well as fruit trees. Note: when this building was remodeled spray foam was used to insulate the walls making the heat/air conditioning very efficient (lower cost) as well as sound insulation between the two floors.  Snow and trash removal and sewer/water included but the tenant will be responsible for gas, electricity, and cable/internet. Absolutely no cats, however, I will consider one small dog. Apartment has had 1 tenant since the renovation 4 years ago. Potential tenants will be required to show a recent pay stub and/or provide a credit score. The apartment is available January 1st. This is for year round leasing not seasonal. Please call- joanne@ show contact info  to set-up a showing as well as ask for any more details. For drive by the address is 11 Alger Street.

Our Mill Hollow Luxury Apartment community located in Guilderland, NY offers pure satisfaction with impeccable apartments and picturesque views. Our very impressive move-in ready spacious two-bedroom two-bathroom open layout homes are set against a vista of the Helderberg Mountains with balconies or patios where you can enjoy the outdoors. We provide BBQ grills behind every building for your convenience and you can also enjoy relaxing in our gazebo, with a fireplace, while looking out at the breathtaking views. We have a walking trail around our scenic pond for you to enjoy and fish at.  Some of the features our apartment homes offer: - Stainless Steel appliances (dish washer, stove, fridge and microwave) - Beautiful Granite Counter Tops Throughout - Large Pantry - Full Size Stacking Washer/Dryers - Ceiling Fans Are in Every Master Bedroom - Double Sink in the Master Bath - Large Walk In Closets - Window Treatments On All Windows and Sliders - Vaulted ceilings in 2nd floor Apartments - Secured buildings - Management on site - 24/7 Maintenance  Our Community is Proud to be Smoke Free and we offer a heated pool, large clubhouse with 24 hour access you can host events at. We offer a fitness room, yoga room and movie theater to entertain. We have garages and climate controlled storage units available as well.  Mill Hollow is located off Route 20, close to the Town Hall and Guilderland Police Department. We are minutes from shopping, dining and entertaining, but also have the country charm that you desire.  Call us today or email us to schedule a tour! We look forward to seeing you! Our office hours are: Monday-Friday 9-5 pm Saturdays 10-3 pm
